title: Linux lpq Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the lpq command in Linux, learn how to check the print queue status, and manage print jobs effectively.

meta.title: Linux lpq Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the lpq command in Linux, learn how to check the print queue status, and manage print jobs effectively.
meta.keywords: Linux, lpq, print queue, print job management, networking, communication

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the lpq Command

verify.name: Verify the lpq command syntax
verify.hint: Make sure you can run the `lpq` command and see the expected output, which includes the "Rank" column.

steps.title: Check the Print Queue Status Using the lpq Command

verify.name: Verify the lpq command options
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `-l` and `-P` options of the `lpq` command to display the expected output.

steps.title: Manage Print Jobs with the lpq Command

verify.name: Verify the lprm command
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `lprm` command to remove a print job from the queue.

verify.name: Verify the lpc command
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the `lpc hold` and `lpc release` commands to pause and resume a print job.
